segments.text: Oh , sir . I lost my passport .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you remember when and where you last saw it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I remember I saw when I was dining in the Aidan Restaurant . When I paid the bill , I saw it in my handbag .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you please tell me your passport number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And what is the expiration date on your passport ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Please fill out this form . And you need to contact your embassy or consulate to report it as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
